displayName.japanese: 修理費用は誰が出しますか？

description.english: Die more than 100 times
description.german: Stirb mehr als 100 Mal
description.french: Mourir plus de 100 fois
description.italian: Muori più di 100 volte
description.spanish: Muere más de 100 veces
description.schinese: 死亡超过100次
description.tchinese: 死亡超過100次
description.russian: Умереть более 100 раз
description.japanese: 100回以上死ぬ
description.brazilian: Morra mais de 100 vezes

displayName.french: La mort n'est pas la fin
displayName.spanish: La muerte no es el final
displayName.japanese: 死は終わりではありません
displayName.brazilian: A morte não é o fim
